# firewalla-msp_devices (Data Source)

Data source for fetching Firewalla Devices

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "firewalla-msp_devices" "devices" {
  filter_box = "Firewalla"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `filter_box` (String) Filter Devices by Box GID
- `filter_group` (String) Filter Devices by Group

### Read-Only

- `devices` (Attributes List) List of Devices (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--devices))

<a id="nestedatt--devices"></a>
### Nested Schema for `devices`

Read-Only:

- `gid` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `ip` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `online` (Boolean)
